con:testCase.name: BadCase-DEV-CreditCard-AccessRights
con:testCase.con:description:
Tests not allowed access to credit card services. https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-1832
For access forbidden provider is selected Talkline/Drillisch with Tenant=1, BrandID=38, SP=SP502
SP_NAME SP_SAS_CODE SP_OCS_CODE SP_VOMS_Code Limit_Cycle SP_Internal_Code SP_Active BRAND_ID Brand_Name TENANT_ID Tenant_Name FINANCE_DEPARTMENT Channel_creditcard Mobilcom SP501 04 p04 None MO Yes 37 Mobilcom Prepaid 1 TEF TEF No Talkline / Drillisch SP502 05 p05 None TL Yes 38 Talkline, Mobilcom/Debitel 1 TEF TEF No Freenet, Klarmobil SP503 03 p03 None FN Yes 39 Freenet Prepaid 1 TEF TEF No

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>BrandId: 38 is not accepted for partner PPIT.</faultstring> <detail> <ns2:drcFault xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/"> <retryPossible>false</retryPossible> <originator>DRC</originator> <originatorMessage>Service provider not accepted for applicationId</originatorMessage> <errorCode>1051</errorCode> <message>Service provider not accepted for applicationId</message> </ns2:drcFault> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
